oracle.adf.view.rich.model

Interface TreeHierarchyInfoProvider


  • public interface TreeHierarchyInfoProvider
    Indicates that the object is capable of providing 'varStatus' information on the current position in the hierarchy.
    The returned list contains the index of each node in the path to the current row. The indices are 1 indexed
    For example, given the following tree structure 
    
 - Animals
   - Cat
   - Dog
 - Fruit
   - Apple
   - Banana
   - Orange
   - Papaya
    Then the list for 'Orange' will be {2, 3} - Fruit is the second element at the root level, and Orange is the third element in the Fruit collection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Integer> getHierarchicalIndex()
      Gets the row indices of heirarchy of the currrent row, 1 indexed.

    • Method Detail

      • getHierarchicalIndex

        List<Integer> getHierarchicalIndex()
        Gets the row indices of heirarchy of the currrent row, 1 indexed.
        Returns:
        The row indices to reach the current row.
